# <a name="add-a-holiday-calendar-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="84cdc-102">在 Outlook.com 中新增假日行事曆</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="84cdc-102">Add a holiday calendar in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="84cdc-103">在頁面底部，選取 [行事曆] 圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="84cdc-103">At the bottom of the page, select the calendar icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="84cdc-104">若要[移至行事曆](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="84cdc-104">to [go to Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="84cdc-105">在左窗格中，選取 [**新增行事曆** > **有趣的行事曆** > **假日**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="84cdc-105">In the left pane, select **Add calendar** > **Interesting Calendars** > **Holidays**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="84cdc-106">選取您想要然後選取左上角儲存您的選擇，並關閉 [**新增行事曆**] 視窗中的 [ **X**假日行事曆。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="84cdc-106">Select the holiday calendar you want and then select **X** in the top corner to save your choice and close the **Add calendar** window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="84cdc-107">深入了解[新增或移除 [生日] 及 [假日行事曆](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="84cdc-107">Learn more about [adding or removing birthday and holiday calendars](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
